mapper.select: SELECT q_no, q_title, q_content, u_id, to_char(q_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as q_regdate, s_num, (select count(q_r_no) from qna_reply where q_no = qna.q_no) as q_cnt FROM qna WHERE s_num = #{s_num} ORDER BY q_no desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna(q_no, q_title, u_id, q_content, s_num) VALUES(qna_seq.nextval, #{q_title}, #{u_id}, #{q_content}, #{s_num})
mapper.delete: /* Qna - qnaDelete */ DELETE FROM qna WHERE q_no = #{q_no} and s_num = #{s_num}
